dishDetails.discoverRegions: Discover the regions where you can enjoy this exquisite dish.

recipes.name: Corn Bread
recipes.description: Traditional bread made from corn, characteristic of the Andean trails, notable for its smooth texture and slightly sweet flavor.
recipes.details: Corn Bread is a delicious traditional bread made from corn, known for its smooth texture and slightly sweet touch. Perfect for accompanying any meal and an icon of the region's culinary traditions.

recipes.name: Egg Arepa
recipes.description: Delicious fried arepa filled with egg, a popular dish on the Atlantic coast, ideal for an energetic breakfast.
recipes.details: Egg Arepa is an iconic dish of the Atlantic coast, characterized by its fried corn flour dough filled with egg. This delicious delicacy is served hot and widely enjoyed as breakfast or a snack.

recipes.name: Fish Sancocho
recipes.description: Comforting fish soup accompanied by yuca and plantain, typical of coastal regions and highly appreciated in family gatherings.
recipes.details: Fish Sancocho is a traditional soup that combines fresh fish with yuca, plantain, and various herbs and spices. This comforting dish is known for its robust flavor and is often part of family celebrations in the Pacific region.

recipes.name: Grilled Pirarucú
recipes.description: Grilled pirarucú fish, a delicacy of the Amazon known for its juicy meat and unique flavor.
recipes.details: Grilled Pirarucú is a highlighted dish of the Amazon, prepared with the large pirarucú fish grilled with garlic, lemon, and spices. Its meat is soft yet robust, offering a unique gastronomic experience that reflects the richness of the region.

recipes.name: Mamona
recipes.description: Marinated grilled beef, a symbol of the plains' gastronomy, ideal for enjoying at parties and gatherings.
recipes.details: Mamona is a traditional dish made from marinated and grilled beef, known for its intense flavor and tender texture. It is usually accompanied by yuca and salads, becoming a favorite at gatherings and festivities.

privacyPolicy.introductionDescription: At [Company Name], we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our services.
privacyPolicy.informationCollectedDescription: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, as well as information that we obtain automatically when you use our services. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and usage data.
privacyPolicy.useOfInformationDescription: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you about updates and offers. We may also use your information for analytics and security purposes.
privacyPolicy.sharingInformationDescription: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except when necessary to comply with the law, protect our rights, or provide our services.
privacyPolicy.securityDescription: We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsDescription: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications. To exercise these rights, please contact us at [contact email].

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: Select a region to see the typical dishes of the area:

pacifica.name: Pacifica region
pacifica.description: A warm and vibrant place, with rains that nourish mangroves and tropical rainforests full of color and biodiversity.

andina.name: Andina region
andina.description: Home to imposing mountains, such as the Galeras volcano, with unique landscapes that combine highlands and deep canyons.

amazonia.name: Amazonia region
amazonia.description: A magical corner of dense forests and mountains, where the La Cocha lagoon becomes a true paradise.
